awardsHtml:
19 wins & 36 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2007 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Art Direction for a Single Camera Series
Joseph Bennett (production designer) - Anthony Pratt (production designer) - Carlo Serafin (art director) - Cristina Onori (set decorator) (For episode "Heroes of the Republic, Philippi, Deus Impeditio Esuritori Nullus".)
2007 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for a Single-Camera Series
Alik Sakharov (director of photography) (For episode "Passover".)
2007 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Costumes for a Series
April Ferry (costume designer) - Augusto Grassi (costume supervisor) - Uliva Pizzetti (costume supervisor) (For episode "De Patre Vostro (About Your Father)".)
2007 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Hairstyling for a Series
Aldo Signoretti (department head hairstylist) - Stefano Ceccarelli (key hairstylist) - Claudia Catini (additional hairstylist) - Michele Vigliotta (additional hairstylist) (For episode "De Patre Vostro (About Your Father)".)
2007 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Makeup for a Series (Non-Prosthetic)
Maurizio Silvi (department head makeup artist) - Francesco Nardi (key makeup artist) - Federico Laurenti (additional makeup artist) - Laura Tonello (additional makeup artist) (For episode "De Patre Vostro (About Your Father)".)
